It also documents the questions posed and answers given during the one-on-one sessions pertaining to baseline questions that Canada shared with all one-on-one meeting participants.Industry is encouraged to monitor Ariba Discovery for any future communications relating to DPM P3 and subsequent procurement activities.

# Government Tender Announcement
## RFI #2: Summary of Feedback and Outcomes Report

### Description

This Request for Information (RFI) relates to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)’s DPM P3 project. The RFI #2 Summary of Feedback and Outcomes Report is for information purposes only and marks the end of the feedback collection period.

### Details

* **Publication Date**: August 25, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2023 @ 14:00:00 hours (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 30, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Cardinal, France
* **Contact Email**: [france.cardinal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:france.cardinal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice and Attachment

* **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13931122?extsite=MTM5MzExMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Attachments**: None

### End-User Entities

* **End-User Entity**: Department of Citizenship & Immigration (IRCC)
* **Address**: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H5, Canada

### Note

Please disregard the initial closing time mentioned in Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell postings. This RFI #2 Summary of Feedback and Outcomes Report is for informational purposes only. No response is required. Further communications related to DPM P3 and subsequent procurement activities can be monitored on Ariba Discovery. ---
